name: [XHTX005] (CD) 2009 VA - "East Europe Straight Edge Scene Сompilation"
description: East Europe Straight Edge compilation - mostly bands from Russia, Ukraine and Belarus. This compilation is something I was waiting for a long time. Bringing fresh blood from East part of Europe/Russia. People over there are still very pasionate about hard core punk and living hard times. I am still thinking that most of the bands in East Europe are far more better then those coming from West - when it comes to passion, commitment and dedication - hard core in East Europe is about day to day struggle rather then fucking fashion and pose for a year. Here is the deal: Engage at Will/old school youth crew/, Verdict/mosh core/, Deviant/metalcore/, Still/youth crew/, High X Hopes/nyc style/, Appleshout/trash old school/, Face Forward/melodic old school/, Keep on Fighting/old school/ and Ace Ventura/old school/. Most of the bands sing russian what gives this compilation different dimension and fresh air to my old ears. I love it and would like to see more kids from west supporting "exotic" scenes and inviting those bands to play their towns. What I am missing on this compilation are the lyric sheets with english translation and I dont like the back cover too, however the front is cool rip off of Soviet Union logo with band names and Stay true to yourself slogan. Support required!

name: [XHTX 002] (CD) Flawless Victory - "Young Hearts"
description:
1. Intro
2. Оставайся Собой (Stay Yourself)
3. Семья (Family)
4. Моя Жизнь Принадлежит Мне (My Life Belongs To Me)
5. Перемены (Changes)
6. Не по пути (Not on the way)
7. Молодые Сердца (Young Hearts)
8. Не Мешай Мне Дышать (B67 cover)
9. Straight Edge Revenge (Project X cover)
10. Outro

Debut album of Moscow Straight Edge band Flawless Victory h is out! Guys play cheerful modern hardcore, with noticeable influence of Portuguese School. Lyrics are about friendship, independence and youth. About the time when you build your future yourself and take pleasure in your life without using alcohol or drugs, and when it's important to appreciate and respect people which are around us during this the best and cheerful days of life. The album includes 8 songs and 2 covers of legendary songs of such bands as B67 & Project X.
